title: The Ban on Kanye’s Twitter Account Was Not Lifted
description: The Twitter account for the rapper formerly known as Kanye West was never banned to begin with.
dc:creator: Stuart A. Thompson
media:credit: Jacopo M. Raule/Getty Images For Balenciaga
media:description: Twitter restricted Kanye West’s account two weeks ago, meaning it is still visible but cannot interact on the social media platform.
